video.title: Camelia la Texana
video.synopsis: Inspired by the famous song "Contrabando y Traición," Camelia, a beautiful girl from San Antonio, kills her lover and becomes a legendary drug runner.

episodes.synopsis: 1973. Camelia is very pleased with what she’s achieved in Houston. Emilio decides to leave Alacrán behind and go after Camelia.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Alma has a nightmare. Lu suggests Don Antonio start planting marijuana, and his heroin lab explodes.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Facundo and Carson let Alacrán go. Emilio comes up with a plan to get close to Camelia, Nora and Rosaura.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Allison confronts Emilio for leaving her alone with their son. Arnulfo is certain Antonio is up to something.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Yisus is willing to turn Emilio in for the reward money. Emilio goes with Camelia to rescue Nora.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Nora tells Facundo and Carson that Camelia ran off with Emilio to Houston and Rosaura found the drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Alma predicts a snowstorm. Don Antonio asks his people to prepare for war against Arnulfo and the Nacha.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Carson proposes Facundo act as a contact for the DEA. Camelia decides to cross the border on foot, but the Alacrán isn’t far behind.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Lupe tortures Alma. Camelia gains Mireya’s trust and then overpowers her and threatens her to help her escape.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Facundo infiltrates Arnulfo’s ranch under orders from the DEA. Mireya flees with Camelia, while Allison goes with Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Arnulfo and Don Antonio get into a heated argument, and the governor can’t get them to calm down. Suddenly the Nacha shows up.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The Nacha orders Arnulfo to get back together with Alma, and Don Antonio drugs her. Antonio names Benigno the mayor.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Emilio, Allison and Aarón are trying to find out who ratted them out. Emilio messes with Kimberly. Jacinto hits Facundo.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Facundo refuses to be freed. A firefight breaks out at the bar where Mireya and Camelia are singing. The Alacrán kills the Caimán.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Arnulfo orders Jacinto to trust Facundo. Allison calls Xiang and says she’ll take the deal.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Emilio convinces Mireya that his love for Camelia is sincere. Xiang visits Bill and tells him to leave Allison alone.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The Nacha takes Facundo to her house. Camelia burns Arnulfo’s face. Don Antonio’s chickens have been poisoned.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Emilio warns Camelia that Arnulfo wants to kill them, and they’ll have to sell the weed to get the money to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Camelia cancels the sale with Xiang when she finds out he’s working for Don Antonio. Allison leaves with Camelia and Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Jacinto goes to Don Antonio’s ranch to kill Alma. Arnulfo performs a ritual on Facundo, with the Nacha by his side.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Camelia pretends to cry after committing a horrible act. When the police arrive at the scene of the crime, Camelia runs away, but gets hit by a car.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Facundo tells Carson that Camelia killed Emilio. Camelia confesses and decides to turn herself in.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Camelia hits Bernardo when he tells her to take off her clothing for a medical exam.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Arnulfo sends Facundo to meet up with the Nacha. Chava tells Camelia he gave up the diner for her sake.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: The Alacrán saves Mireya. Aarón promises Allison he’ll make sure Camelia pays for what she’s done.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Facundo kidnaps Lu, and Don Antonio receives a ransom letter. Benigno invites Xiang to stay with him.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Don Antonio declares war against the Nacha, who threatens to serve him to “Camelia the Texan” on a silver platter.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Aarón is upset with Allison. Facundo wants to run away with Camelia, but the Nacha gets in the way.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: The Alacrán emerges from the ditch where Aarón buried him alive. The general discovers Facundo’s true identity.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Aarón tells Allison he killed the Alacrán. Urdapilleta makes a shamelessly bold move that unleashes a firefight.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Camelia makes a deal with Carson and Facundo to get Octavio Franco put in prison. The Maikol binds and gags Aarón and Allison.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Allison asks Arnulfo to help her get revenge on Camelia and protect her from Don Antonio, who wants her dead.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Mireya and the Alacrán are held captive at the Treviños’ ranch. Arnulfo orders Allison to kill Aarón.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Facundo and Camelia are about to leave Franco’s house, but Camelia would rather stay and find out more about Antonio Treviño.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: A soldier is found dead. Don Antonio cheats Arnulfo in the deal and Camelia confesses to being “Camelia the Texan”.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Facundo talks with Carson on the condition that Camelia is taken out of Franco’s house. Mireya, Tomasa and Lu make a pact.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Governor Cruz wants to strip Urdapilleta of his position. The forensic scientist gives Benigno a clue in the case of the murdered women.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Tomasa tells Benigno she knows who killed Mileidy. An agave picker shows up at Franco’s house with Facundo tied up.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Alma takes Octavio his coffee. Urdapilleta catches Tomasa. She claws his face and he grabs her neck.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: The Alacrán proposes to Don Antonio that they kidnap a high-ranking military officer to force Urdapilleta to make a move.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Urdapilleta is informed that all the men at the ranch are dead and they’re moving in to arrest Don Antonio and Benigno.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Natasha and Wilson arrive at the hangar with Daniela bound and gagged. Camelia asks them to take her instead and let Daniela go.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Camelia, Facundo, Carson and Octavio find Natasha and Wilson dead, and they find out Daniela is in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Octavio realizes Alma poisoned him. Facundo asks Camelia to run away with him, but she refuses.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Ortiz proposes a plan to Facundo to dismantle Franco’s group. Allison wants to keep Emilio Jr. from growing up to be a criminal.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Governor Cruz introduces Benigno as the future governor. Carson insists Facundo start working with Ortiz.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Facundo asks Camelia to spare Don Antonio. Don Antonio confesses to Camelia that he’s her father.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Hilda and Arnulfo come up with a plan to get Cuquis on their side. Don Antonio arrives at the ranch with Camelia.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Ortiz gives Facundo a warm welcome. Cuquis tells Arnulfo and Octavio that the Treviños want to partner with them.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Camelia asks Benigno to arrest her for killing Emilio Varela. Lu meets with Rosaura in the town square.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Facundo threatens to put Don Antonio in jail and tells Camelia if she’s not careful she’ll be sharing a cell with her father.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Octavio is arrested. Camelia is in shock when Rosaura tells her she’s pregnant. Mireya listens as Alma shares her dreams.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Carson witnesses Octavio’s murder. Don Antonio, Lu and Facundo are left in shock when they find out Camelia is pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Peter confesses that he killed Octavio to protect Operation Condor. Facundo arrests Camelia for Emilio’s murder.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Arnulfo attacks the car Camelia and Rosaura are riding in. The Alacrán comes to the rescue, but it may be too late.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Ortiz tells Facundo the charges against Camelia have been dropped. Emilio Jr. goes for his gun, intent on taking justice into his own hands.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Camelia’s baby is in trouble. McQueen and Emilio Jr. give Allison a funeral. McQueen doesn’t know what to do with Emilio Jr.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Ibarra says only a miracle can save Don Antonio now. Lu takes care of Urdapilleta. Arnulfo tortures Camelia.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Arnulfo is furious to find out Camelia’s escaped. Don Antonio thanks Facundo for saving her.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Camelia prepares for her final battle against Arnulfo. If she survives, she’ll have to learn to live her life as “Camelia the Texan”.
episodes.title: Episode 60
